edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.service

Class RngService

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.service.RngService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Component
public class RngService
extends Random
    Spring Bean extending Random, to support injection into other components requiring simple (non-cryptographic and non-scientific quality) psuedorandom numbers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RngService()
      Initializes this instance with the default seed strategy.
      RngService(long seed)
      Initializes this instance with the specified seed value.
